Text: I have been looking for Markus Schulz-You Wont See Me Cry for YEARS!!!  I had the origional vinyl on white label, but my tables, mixer and all my vinyl got jacked out of my apartment.  Stealing vinyl is like stealing somebodies art portfolio.  It may not be worth much to you, but to a dj it's fuckin' priceless.
Thats quite what the ASOT: classics series is meant for; To recover lost classics! Enjoy
